prompt: Design a sleek dark-themed login form with a deep navy background (Color(0xFF1A1A2E)). Structure the interface in a centered column layout with a gradient background from dark navy to slightly lighter navy. Display a prominent 'Welcome Back' heading in bright white (Colors.white) with large bold typography, followed by a light gray subtitle 'Please sign in to your account'. Create two input fields with dark styling: an email TextField with dark gray fill (Colors.grey[800]), white text, cyan accent border when focused, and white email icon; a password TextField with matching dark styling, white lock icon, and cyan visibility toggle. Position a 'Forgot Password?' link in cyan color (Colors.cyan) aligned to the right. Include a full-width login button with a cyan gradient background, white text, and rounded corners. Add bottom text 'Don't have an account?' in light gray followed by a cyan 'Sign Up' link. Apply consistent spacing of 24.0 pixels for main padding and 16.0 pixels between elements. The form should have a subtle dark container with rounded corners and a soft glow effect.
